text: A bullfighter who was slapping a bullfight lost a calf. He searched for it, going around and not finding it. Then he promised Zeus to sacrifice a kid if he found out who had stolen it. He immediately went into the forest and saw a lion eating the calf. He raised his hands to heaven in terror and cried out: "O great Zeus, I promised you a goat if I found the thief. But now I promise you a bull if I can't fall into the thief's clutches! When you look for a solution, remember that it can become the next problem.
title: El león y el bueyero
author: nan Esopo
